negativeUncertainties._instruction: Enter an array of negative uncertainties for this quantitative value array. Note that it must have the same length as the array of quantitative values stated under 'values'.

positiveUncertainties._instruction: Enter an array of positive uncertainties for this quantitative value array. Note that it must have the same length as the array of quantitative values stated under 'values'.

typeOfUncertainty._instruction: Add the type of uncertainty used to determine the uncertainity for this quantitative value array.

unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of this quantitative value array and its uncertainty.

values._instruction: Enter the array of quantitative values.
